entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IDE0044 "make field readonly" false positive #57983
  • [Flaky Test] CSharp.CSharpCodeActions.AddUsingExactMatchBeforeRenameTracking #57982
  • [Flaky Test] VisualBasic.BasicAddMissingReference.InvokeSomeFixesInVisualBasicThenVerifyReferences #57980
  • confusion over whether string is nullable #57974
  • Missing quick action to clean up try/finally or try/catch/finally with an empty finally block #57973
  • Missing quick action for CS0546 ('accessor' : cannot override because 'property' does not have an overridable set accessor) #57972
  • Roslyn dosn't work on VSIX #57971
  • Roslyn emits unnecessary conv.u opcodes over transient pointers #57970
  • Folder based compilation in the .NET project #57967
  • How can you report a diagnostic from an incremental generator? #57965
  • No documentation on difference between RegisterSourceOutput and RegisterImplementationSourceOutput #57963

Closed

  • Navigate to original source from metadata fails to handle documentation comments #57924
    17.1
  • ChangeToRemoveAllGeneratedDocumentsUpdatesListCorrectly is flaky #56826

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge main into features/rawstringliterals #57981
    Area-Compilers, auto-merge
  • Add support for interpolations in raw string literals. #57979
    Area-Compilers
  • Read SourceLink info and call service to retrieve source from there #57978
    Area-IDE
  • Exclude unnecessary sqlite assemblies for .Net 6 host #57977
    Area-IDE, Area-Infrastructure
  • Simplify 'interpolation' data, and move to an easier to consume System.Range approach for it #57966
    Area-Compilers
  • Do less work during CI checkout #57960
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [LSP] Switch to exclusively using semantic tokens range handling #57959
    Area-IDE, LSP

Merged

  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #57975
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57976
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge "list-patterns" feature into `main` branch #57962
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns, Next
  • Clean-up/enhance completion telemetry #57868
    Area-IDE, IDE-IntelliSense, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to main #57954
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #57955
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Simplify the code around parsing interpolated string literals. #57945
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Add IXamlEditAndContinueSolutionProvider for XAML Language Service #57932
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57964
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Treat doc comments line regular comments in metadata as source #57958
    Area-IDE, Next
  • List-patterns: add a few tests and add HasValidate flag #57914
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57961
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Transform the GeneratorDriver even if the Compilation was GCed #57721
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57956
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #57957
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #57984
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Format list patterns #57568
    Area-IDE
  • Share '@'-sign logic with the normal lexer and the interpolated string scanner. #57946
    Area-Compilers
  • Require definite assignment of all fields if struct includes any field initializers #57925
    Area-Compilers
  • List patterns: Skip compiler-generated dag nodes for better codegen #57909
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Share '$' logic with the normal lexer and the interpolated string scanner. #57951
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Handling defaults provided by IAsyncCompletionDefaultsSource #57685
    Area-IDE
  • Use !! in AddParameterCheck refactoring #57934
    Area-IDE
  • Method group conversion caching redo #57882
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Incremental Generator Work Tracking API Implementation #55469
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.1
  • Fix generator caching in compiler server #57177
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • [Async lightbulb performance] Move suppression fixes to 'Low' priority bucket #56959
    Area-IDE, 17.1
  • Add VS integration test pipeline #57953
    Area-Infrastructure
